item.title: Curriculum Vitae
item.description:
Click here to see my current CV.

Publications in Referreed Journals

  1. D.L. Nguyen, K. Stahl, and T. Truong. A new sampling indicator function for stable imaging of periodic scattering media in Inverse Problems, Volume 39, Number 6, May 9, 2023. Link: https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1361-6420/acce5f/meta arXiv: https://arxiv.org/abs/2205.01206
